title: Everglades National Park: Fee Collection and Dispatch Positions
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us     Federal Benefits     Fee Collection and Dispatch Positions                Fee Collection and Dispatch Positions      Visitor Use Assistant (Fee Collection), GS-303 This series includes positions the duties of which are to perform or supervise clerical, assistant, or technician work. The work requires knowledge of the procedures and techniques involved in carrying out the work of an organization and involves application of procedures and practices within the framework of established guidelines. Qualifying experience includes:--Progressively responsible clerical, office, or other work that indicates ability to acquire the particular knowledge and skills needed to perform the duties of the position to be filled. --Experience that has equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills, and ability (KSA's) to perform successfully the duties of the position, and that is typically in or related to the position to be filled.Education above the high school level is also qualifying.  Â   Telecommunications Equipment Officer, GS-390 This series includes work that involves performing or supervising the operation of equipment in transmitting, receiving and relaying messages. The work requires knowledge of message-handling procedures and use of computer hardware and software or other equipment to send messages to their proper destinations. Qualifying experience includes:--Progressively responsible clerical, office, or other work that indicates ability to acquire the particular knowledge and skills needed to perform the duties of the position to be filled. --Experience that has equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills, and ability (KSA's) to perform successfully the duties of the position, and that is typically in or related to the position to be filled.Education above the high school level is also qualifying.
